queriesDict.name: Beladeliste
queriesDict.statement: SELECT VERSION FROM DQM.DQMBEL_BELADELISTE WHERE BORDERONUMMER = @param{BORDERONUMMER} AND WERKNUMMER = @param{WERKNUMMER}
SELECT * FROM DQM.V_BEL_PACKSTUECK_AVIS WHERE BORDERONUMMER = @param{BORDERONUMMER} AND WERKNUMMER = @param{WERKNUMMER}
DELETE FROM DQM.DQMBEL_SCAN WHERE BORDERONUMMER = @param{BORDERONUMMER} AND WERKNUMMER = @param{WERKNUMMER}
